snippet: The United Nations secretary general on Friday said that those who used chemical weapons in Syria should be brought to justice.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon says those who used chemical weapons in Syria should be brought to justice, even as team of United Nations inspectors say that their inquiries alone cannot establish who is at fault.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations secretary general on Friday said that those who used chemical weapons in Syria should be brought to justice.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Responds to Syria Report
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Responds to Syria Report
